Value.label: Current Overload Protection
Value.Help: Current Overload Protection. Load will be closed when the Current more than 39.5A and the time more than 5 seconds

Value.label: Notification status
Value.Help: Enables automatic notifications to associated devices whenever there is a state change.

Value.label: Wattage threshold
Value.Help: The minimum change in wattage for a report to be sent.

Value.label: Wattage threshold percent
Value.Help: Minimum change in percent of wattage to send a report.

Value.label: Default Group Reports
Value.Help: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default. Reverts to 0 after set.

Value.label: Report type G1
Value.Help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts. Value 1 (msb) Reserved Value 2 Reserved Value 3 Reserved Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved bit 3 MRC (KWH) bit 2 MRC (watt) bit 1 MSRC (Current) bit 0 MRC (Voltage)
The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.
The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.
The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0) Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.
